keywords: Finger food,High protein,Tree nut free,Egg free,Low sugar,Peanut free
name: Cheese Veggie Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cheese ball recipe: Smash boiled potatoes and add grated carrot, sweet corn, green peas, salt, chilli powder, pepper powder, broccoli, cheese. - roll into balls (see photo for approx size).
To make balls dip the mixture in corn flour, then water and then roll in bread crumbs.
Keep the veggie cheese balls in the fridge for 20 to 30 min to set. You can store them in fridge for 2-3 days if you avoid using cheese in the balls.
Fry the balls in a little oil on medium heat in a saucepan. Flip the balls periodically not to over burn. Voila yummy cheese veggie balls ready.
